explains: n. （录音等的）重放，（播放的）录音；录音重放装置

sentences.en: I heard a playback of one of the tapes.
sentences.cn: 我听到了其中一盘录音带的回放。

sentences.en: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.cn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具有这些基本特征：自动调焦、回放及变焦镜头。

sentences.en: The advanced 96k upsampling raises the bar for playback of movies, television, and concert films mastered for Blu-ray Disc.
sentences.cn: 先进的96k升采样技术提高了播放蓝光光盘所制作的电影，电视和音乐会电影的标准。
